Class SearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w18t05.taskzilla.controller.SearchController

  • public class SearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller that deals with the backend stuff related to the screen.
    See Also:
    SearchFragment

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SearchController(SearchFragment v, android.content.Context context)
      The view and context of the activity is passed into this controller

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addKeywords(java.lang.String word)
      Adds keywords the user input into an arraylist
      void clearKeywords()
      Clears the arraylist holding the keywords
      void getAllRequest()
      This method invokes a get all request, which is then sent to the request manager which determines if the app is online or offline, before doing the request.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getKeywords()
      Returns the arraylist containing the keywords the user inputted
      java.util.ArrayList<Task> getResults()
      Returns a list of tasks which corresponds to the keywords given
      void searchRequest(java.lang.String sentence)
      This method invokes a search request using the given keywords, which is then sent to the request manager which determines if the app is online or offline, before doing the request.

        public void searchRequest(java.lang.String sentence)
